content.67/m 10: none/4 5/farmer 4 9 0 Sandy 2 5 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote Sandy 8/speak Sandy "有……客人？"/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 2 0 2/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 0 1 2/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "嗨！你好！歡迎光臨「沙蒂的綠洲」！#$b#你看起來很像艾米麗在信中提到的那個新來的農夫嘛！#$b#然後……往返星露谷的巴士路線又開始服務啦！$h#$b#噢，我好高興啊！$h"/emote Sandy 32/move Sandy 0 -1 0/move Sandy -2 0 2/emote Sandy 32/end dialogue Sandy "請常常來光顧哦，我在這裡很無聊。"
